column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The ambience here is quite neat. It's classy
column4: and chic all at the same time (+ cheers for a ton of outdoor lighting!).  Not recommended if you're cramming for final exams
column5: but a perfect spot to take a date or someone new to the Houston area.  Weekend afternoons here are pretty packed
column6: but outdoor seating and a fast customer turnover more than make up for it.
